user_review: Ordered the pork and cheese pupusa and pork, cheese and beans pupusa, overall I can say they are the best pupusas I've ever had. Amongst the best in Montreal for sure.Get the extra spicy sauce for additional enjoyment. I'll definitely come back to try the rest of the menu.

Cheese puppusa was solid - the mrs liked it but wished she could have it with chickenI enjoyed the pork n cheese puppusa - served with a mild tomatoe sauce, Â hot sauce n pickled slaw.2-3 pappusas per person is a good serving sizeMy daughter tried the tamale with chickenAlso got the yucca n pork dish for the tableNo menu but host was great and very reasonable prices

I just got take out from Dona Maria..and i gotta say that i dont know how i never knew about this place.food was great and prices are fair! Not overpriced like some other places have gotten.had pupusas,tamal,plantain and an order of chicharron y yuca.and everything was great!even the people that worked there were super nice.will definatly be back.

The best pupusas in town!!! Hands down. The owners (family owned) are still the ones behind the kitchen so you know you're getting the real deal. Beware : this is not your typical fast service restaurant. Be patient. The older man may have a rude/grumpy look to him, but he's actually very nice. The food definitely makes up for it though. I would recommend the chicken and cheese pupusas and the appetizer platter with fried yuccas and pork. They are open late and right in front of the metro!
